name: Tale of Spirit Hollow
description:
“I feel empty. I can’t hold my own thoughts… It feels like someone has fed on my memories. I need to find out what happened.”

You play as Spirit, an outcast soul who doesn't remember her past. Your spiritual life is vanishing, and you must choose between draining other soul's life force, or run against the time to reach your objective.  How are you going to recover these memories?

Controls:

  • WASD - Walk
  • Left Mouse button - Absorb other soul's energy
  • 1 and 2 - Special Abilities (once you have unlocked them)
